amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 115-297 to prevent funds being used to implement the Bureau of Land Management's "Onshore Oil and Gas Operations; Federal and Indian Oil and Gas Leases; Site Security" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A088) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A088) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A088) offered by Mr. Pearce.
